name: Pop The Color Blocks
description:
A color matching puzzle game with cool and vibrant colors. Relax, chill and challenge yourself to keep the endless gameplay going, keep the board clean and keep that game score rising! Can you reach the top of the leaderboard? Take the challenge today.

To play, create sequences of three or more blocks of the same color, vertically or horizontally. Switch the direction of the blocks, grab them and then drop them on the board, when you match three or more block colors, pop! You score!

If you like:
- Puzzles
- Matching games
- Endless gameplay

Then you'll love Pop The Color Blocks!
